Posts.Content: HighladerCFH: (from GunsmokeFan's wife again) Thank you for your reply. Glad to see there are other Gunsmoke fans. Thanks for moving my post to the proper area; that's where I intended it to go. So far I'm not finding anyone who has had this procedure. Do you know of how we might find some statistics of success and side effects data? thanks for the reco on Walsh's book,.
Posts.Signature: [u]PC, Diagnosed 7/2013; Gleason 7 (4+3) Stage 1; 15% of one of 12 biopsy samples PSA: 10/2008 3.5; 6/2010 4.4; 9/2012 9.5; 7/2013 8.6; 2/2014 7.1; 6/2014 9.7; 7/2015 8.5? Breast Cancer[/b], IDC: R side, Diagnosed 7/2014, AJCC Stage IIB; TII; Nottingham Score: Grade 3; 100% estrogen receptive, Mastectomy Surgery 8/2014, clear margins, 1 of 3 nodes positive Melanoma; L Shoulder, Diagnosed 6/2014 , Stage II; Surgery 8/2014, clear margins, clear nodes
Posts.Title: Dr. Aaron Katz, New York?

Posts.Content: Hello, This is GunsmokeFan's wife. We are brand new to this site. I'm trying to gather info for dh. We are interested in going to Dr. Katz (prostate cancer) and want to get more info on his focal cryotherapy that my dh has heard about and read about. My dh has two of his books. Please let me know if you have had any contact with this Dr. or been a patient and how your experience was; or private message me if you would prefer (if that is possible on this site; I'm not sure yet). Thank you.
Posts.Title: Dr. Aaron Katz, New York?

Posts.Content: Jim215: thank you for your reply. How would we find out what percentage of patients choose this? or any treatment? And do you know how we could find statistics of rates of side affects (other than maybe what the doctor who does the focal cryotherapy may say)?
